document_data.mainbody:
Nartans Fine Foods was an upscale market located in the town of Daggerford during the late 14 century DR. It catered to both wealthy Daggerford residents and those visitors who had enough gold to afford Nartans steep prices.
It was located on the western side of Daggerfords Money Quarter in central Daggerford along the High Road.
Nartans shop was protected by a ward that preserved all the food within and prevented it from going bad.
The shop offered a wide variety of high-quality foods and spices from all across Faer√ªn, as far away as Chult or even the Ice Mountains in the North.
